name: Ctrl Alt Defeat
description:
YOU take the role of a disgruntled unemployed martial arts expert and ex-security guard of a magnet factory who is set on battling his way through the multitude of self defense robots between him and his old boss so he can prove his worth and throw the CEO out the window. 

CTRL ALT DEFEAT is a 3D turn-based and grid-based game in which the player uses the stances of Karate, Judo and Taekwondo to reach the end of each level.
